root: ^A mirror-like shard shimmers before you. An unsettled feeling of deja vu fills your mind. The shard flickers between scenes of various scenes of the past, present and future...
^Skip: This seems to be the one.

dawnbringer: ^Your thoughts settle on most radiant presence of them all. A searing awareness enters your mind as vivid images of battle appear on the stones hot surface.

c-2: ^"Corellion!" the young priestess exclaims excitedly, trying to discern the dark background of the stone's vision. "By the light, he's alive!"
c-3: ^You see an angelic figure fending off beasts composed of utter darkness. Though the demons seem to fall readily at the hands of the Dawnbringer, there is a weariness in the presence you feel.

bs: ^It has been a while, but if I am not mistaken, those are the walls of the Dark Citadel itself. I barely recognize it, but the architecture is unmistakable!

^Bolgar nods. "It seems like we found our destination. The Citadel itself has wards against my magic, but I'll be able to get us close enough. Just keep me out of trouble for a moment, I have a feeling we might have attracted some unwanted attention."
